properties.name: 800 Ounces and a Hole
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Yellow Bottom6 places for camping, great access, shallow bedrock, bring boulder slings and a small Dredge or Highbanker

properties.name: Amargosa # 3
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Palmdale CaliforniaThe gold here is on the front edge near the creek, the bigger gold is in the hardpack down deep.

properties.name: Amargosa #1
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Amargosa CreekJust West of Palmdale California, the gold here can be very rewarding at the Red Cliff

properties.name: Amargosa #2
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964The BarThe bar has the gold along the edge of the bank, not at the rivers edge, on the top lip

properties.name: Booth Road
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Myrtle Creek #2Pull over and dig, gold is good and a 1/4 ounce every half hour is easy when you crevice.

properties.name: Dam #1
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Little Rock DamFew and far between, but there is gold

properties.name: Exit 110
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Myrtle CreekGet OFF here, find a path to the river, if you don\'t see gold in a hour and have a beer in your hand, you need to find another hobby.

properties.name: Fairbanks
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964fairbanks, alaskaPedro Dome: Is the oldest such area in the Fairbanks area. The area is the general location where Gold was first discovered in the Fairbanks area by Felix Pedro on July 22, 1902. This is the strike that put Fairbanks on the map. Small area, approximately 1 acre in size open to gold pans, metal detectors, sluice boxes and rocker boxes. There are no facilities such as restrooms, drinking water or food vendors in the area.

properties.name: Freedom Claim
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964North Santiambetter to have a permit than to cross the rangers, bring your parking pass and be ready for a good hike to the river, the gold is very good

properties.name: Last Chance
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Last Chance CanyonPinkie Nail sized Nuggets are known to be here, I found a thumbnail sized nugget in this area. Pay my way and I\'ll show you where.

properties.name: MRT Lower 40
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964North SantiamBring the Dredge, and your Guest Pass, Violators will be shot

properties.name: Nome Creek Mining Area
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Nome Creek Mining AreaNome Creek: Is the largest area of this kind in Alaska. Gold pans, metal detectors, sluice boxes and rocker boxes only. It has a rich history of gold production and is easily accessible even with the super size motorhomes that tourists bring to Alaska. A huge road project completed in 1997 made access to this area from the Steese Highway very easy. Road begins at 57.3 mile Steese Highway. The road is approximately 5 miles long from the Steese Highway to Nome Creek mining area. Restrooms (outhouses) available and camping areas too. The Steese Highway is paved only to mile 44.

properties.name: Placerita Canyon
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Placerita CanyonIf you go in after dark, be gone before sunrise. Midnight Mining is the only way

properties.name: Public Access
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Myrtle CreekWhen you get to the river, you just drove over all the gold, in fact, you just parked on it.

properties.name: Pyramid Lake West Fork
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Hungry ValleyAccess from Hungry Valley Off Road, hike in and expect to spend 5 days for the best return

properties.name: RV Park
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Â Myrtle Creek10 feet from your RV door and it is great gold, bring deep water gear for some places as 2 pounds of gold in a day is not a rumor

properties.name: Red Rover #2
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Acton CaliforniaGold Mine - Checking the gullies around these people homes after a good rain, and under the freeways is always a way to score a gold nugget.

properties.name: Red Rover Area #3
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Acton CaliforniaGold - In the gullies and in the ground, when the water is flowing there\'s gold to be found. ( Bring your detector, and rattlesnake stick )

properties.name: RedRover Mine#1
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Acton CaliforniaGoldmining Mine - The Houses today sit on more gold than the worth of the property, too bad stupid people close land, the gold is real close to the surface.

properties.name: Sunshine Creek
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Diamond peakFine gold shouldn\'t be here, but it is.

properties.name: Texas Mint Canyon
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Southern CaliforniaLost in time to the locals, this canyon has produced gold for a hundred years and no one seems to remember just how much gold was brought out of this canyon. I used to mine this canyon in the 1970\'s, the gold is good if you can find a way to get to it anymore.

properties.name: The Gorge
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Pyramid Lake West Fork #2Bring the Mask, the Air, and lightweight equipment that fits in your backpack yet handles a days work.

properties.name: The Junk Store
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Myrtle CreekAlong this stretch, you will most likely find the old town dumpings, but the gold is so good that the old silverware you find will just make you smile. GOOD GOLD

properties.name: The plateau
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Last Chance #2Your close to where it is, pay attention to the colors of the layers and you\'ll be digging at night when the water flows, dry during the day,

properties.name: Upper Mollala Gold Tributary
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Upper MollalaWhen you reach the end of the road, it\'s time to break out the equipment.

properties.name: Yellow Bottom #1
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Yellow Bottom #1After the Bridge, stay to the right, cross the bridge, road to the left. DIG

properties.name: Yellow Bottom Miners Camp
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Miners CampMiners Camp - Great Camping, Good Gold

properties.name: YellowBottom Chutes
properties.description: Posted by Redpaw1964Yellow BottomA mile in either direction will get you gold, you can\'t miss this gold.
